questions.quote: There's a big dinner Tuesday night at Frank's house - everyone's invited.
So when you get a rash all over your face in January do you think Coleman's will be there with a medical plan?
No, I don't want. So, just tell me what I owe you for your trouble..
Morty Seinfeld. I cut velvet for forty years with Harry Altman.
Hey, Jerry! Listen, I need you to come downstairs, help me get my stuff outta the car.
The Van Buren Boys? There's a street gang named after President Martin Van Buren?
Well it must be comforting to know you'll be going straight to hell at no more than three miles an hour.
Yeah, and him too. What?! Oh, yeah! I think George is calling me, so I'm gonna go give him a hand. Come on! Come on!
Yes! And I put him up to it, because I'm sick! I'm the one that needs help.
Yeah.  ... Oh, you think because of what I said about the manure. I wa, wa, was just saying how it takes a negative thing, and puts it on a positive spin on it.
